group.title: family history
group.text: This module asks about your family’s medical history. Understanding these medical issues can tell us a lot about what kinds of medical issues might be related to your genetics.

question.text: Do you know your family’s medical history? Please include only those family members you are related to by blood.

extension.valueString: ¿Conoce la historia médica de su familia biológica?

question.text: QUESTION LABEL WAS NOT DEFINED, PLEASE CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR

option.display: head and neck (this includes cancers of the mouth, sinuses, nose, or throat. this does not include brain cancer.)

question.text: please specify
QUESTION LABEL WAS NOT DEFINED, PLEASE CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR

option.display: atrial fibrillation (or a-fib) or atrial flutter (or a-flutter). (these conditions cause irregular, often fast, heart beats that can cause poor blood flow. a-fib and a-flutter are not the same as a heart murmur.)
pulmonary embolism or deep vein thrombosis (dvt)

question.text: QUESTION LABEL WAS NOT DEFINED, PLEASE CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR
QUESTION LABEL WAS NOT DEFINED, PLEASE CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR

option.display: type 1 diabetes (type 1 diabetics do not produce enough insulin on their own, so they have get insulin injections. type 1 diabetes used to be called juvenile onset diabetes.)
type 2 diabetes (type 1 diabetics do not produce enough insulin on their own, so they have get insulin injections. type 1 diabetes used to be called juvenile onset diabetes. )
other/unknown diabetes (this includes gestational diabetes (diabetes during pregnancy) and borderline diabetes (pre-diabetes).)

question.text: QUESTION LABEL WAS NOT DEFINED, PLEASE CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR
QUESTION LABEL WAS NOT DEFINED, PLEASE CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR

option.display: chronic lung disease (copd, emphysema or bronchitis)

option.display: osteoporosis (low bone mass or thin bones)
osteoarthritis (oa) (also called degenerative joint disease, results from narrowing of cartilage)
rheumatoid arthritis (ra) (also called inflammatory arthritis, results from autoimmune processes)

question.text: Has anyone in your immediate family ever been diagnosed with any other health conditions? Please think only of family you are closely related to by blood, including your parents, your grandparents, your sisters, your brothers, and your children.

extension.valueString: ¿Ha sido alguien en su familia biológica inmediata  diagnosticado con otra condición de salud?

question.text: Have any of your grandparents ever been diagnosed with any other health conditions? Please include only those grandparents you are related to by blood.

extension.valueString: ¿Ha/n sido su/s abuelo(s) diagnosticado/s con otra condición de salud?

question.text: specify here
Has your mother ever been diagnosed with any other health conditions? Please include only the woman who gave birth to you.

extension.valueString:
¿Ha sido su madre diagnosticada con otras condiciones de salud alguna vez?
Has your mother ever been diagnosed with any other health conditions?

question.text: specify here
Has your father ever been diagnosed with any other health conditions? Please include only the father you are related to by blood.

extension.valueString: ¿Ha sido su padre diagnosticado con otras condiciones de salud alguna vez?

question.text: specify here

Do you have a brother or sister who has ever been diagnosed with any other health conditions? Please  include only brothers and sisters you are related to by blood. If you have more than one brother and/or sister, include health conditions for each brother and/or sister.

extension.valueString: ¿Ha/n sido su/s hemano/a (s) diagnosticado/a/as/os con otras condiciones de salud alguna vez?

question.text: specify here

Do you have a daughter who has ever been diagnosed with any other health conditions? Please  include only daughters you are related to by blood. If you have more than one daughter, include health conditions for each daughter.

extension.valueString: ¿Ha sido su hija diagnosticada con otras condiciones de salud alguna vez?

question.text: specify here

Do you have a son who has ever been diagnosed with any other health conditions? Please include only sons you are related to by blood. If you have more than one son, include health conditions for each son.

extension.valueString: ¿Ha sido su hijo diagnosticado con otras condiciones de salud alguna vez?

question.text: specify here
